lore: These constructs serve as the eyes and ears of their masters while tomb worlds slumber, and as spectral assassins once their armies march out to war. Their dimensional destabilisation matrices allow them to phase in and out of reality, passing through solid objects and sliding their talons through armour, flesh and bone.

otherAbilities.name: Wraith Form
otherAbilities.description: Each time this unit ends a Normal move, you can select one enemy unit it moved over during that move and roll one D6 for each model in this unit: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

wargear.description: Any number of models can each be equipped with one of the following:
Any number of models can each have their vicious claws replaced with whip coils.
